short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable scraping keys from game bundle websites such as humble bundle and fanatical.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will pull your keys gained from fanatical or humble bundle allowing you to copy either both game name and key or just the key allowing you to gift mass amounts of keys or redeem them as a part of a script easier
